page.title: 09HEVERSHAM SPORTS DAY (cont.)
page.content:
After tea we had a wheelbarrow race for boys and girls.
The egg and spoon race was next. They had a Borders Race and a Visiting Children's Race. The last event was the fell race. The infants have a race round the field. The juniors go up to the Head and up to the first telephone wire. The intermediates go up to the Head and to the fourth telephone wire and back. The juniors go up to the top of the Head across the Head and down. It was a very enjoyable day and good fun. Al night the parents had a dance.
